comment.author: 59898224@N07
comment._content: Ceremonial return of the skull of Chief Mkwawa from Germany 1954

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The skull is being carried by the Chief of the Hehe people, Chief Adam Sapi, being Mkwawa's grandson, dressed in traditional Hehe robes, at Kalenga, Iringa District, 9 June 1954.
